articles.title: NASA, Former Astronauts Commemorate the 50th Anniversary of Apollo 13 - Travel + Leisure
articles.description: On April 13, 1970, the Apollo 13's lunar landing was aborted in what would become a historic mission.
articles.content:
"Houston, we've had a problem."
Fifty years after that famed phrase aboard the Apollo 13 was spoken, legends and institutions of space exploration are taking to a different form of communication to commemorate the historic mission — Twitter.
